runs.comm: comes out of the crease straightaway, pushes it to the right of the bowler
hello hello! Reverse sweep! Roy is making some statement here. Plays it flat and hard through point..
this is superb shot! Ashwin bowls it flatter and shorter outside off and Roy punches it through the gap at cover, lots of wrist as he places it right in the gap
comes forward and works it away to deep midwicket with a neat flick
excellent start for England! Hales waits for this flatter one and crashes it off the back foot, through cover
England are on some high-energy pills! Hales goes down on his knees and laps this one all the way over deep backward square leg, it clears the ropes.
loud appeal for lbw as this one hits the batsman in his forward lunge, it looked like it struck him well outside the line of off. Easy call for umps
he walks across the stumps and looks to work it on the on side, but gets rapped on the thigh pad. Hales calls for a quick single and makes it through comfortably
delivers this one on a length outside off, Hales punches it on the up, but straight to the man at mid-off
he clears his front leg out of the way and looks to crash this through covers, but finds Raina at cover
he shuffles in the crease and looks to hit it across the line, but gets a bit of bottom edge to short fine leg
walloped! Hales comes down the pitch and whacks this straight down the ground for his second six. Ruins what was turning out to be good over for India
fires in the yorker at 138 kph - he bowled a few good ones in the ODIs - the batsman digs it out to point
he looks to slam it over midwicket with a cross-batted swing but gets bit of inside edge towards mid-on
targets the middle and leg stump as Hales has generally shown a preference for the off side, but he punches this one comfortably down to long on
he creates room and looks to blast it over mid-off, but doesn't get any timing, ends up pushing it back to the bowler
Roy's game is over! He moves to the leg side and looks to drill this fuller delivery over the infield but is not able to get under it.. The fielder at cover takes a straightforward head-high chance
he tucks it to the leg side for a quick single! That was short of length and Moeen doesn't get much bat on it as he looks to work it away
another catch at cover! This one is the cloned sheep! The batsman comes forward and pushes at this length delivery a bit too early, lobs it up for Rahane again. Easiest of chances
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover calmly
he leans into this length delivery and punches it on the up, but straight to Rahane at cover
he shuffles across a touch and whips this length delivery beautifully through the gap at midwicket! Superbly timed..
he looks to crash this away-swinging delivery but he misses it completely
that was not far from the off stump! Mohit slows it down smartly as soon as he sees Root stepping out and the batsman gets an underedge that rolls past the stumps to the keeper
he makes room by moving outside leg stump and cuts the back of length delivery to the off side, but straight to the cover point fielder
fired in the blockhole and the batsman can only dig it out down the ground for a single to mid-on

this is another attempted yorker, but it ends up being a half-volley on leg stump. Root has been in such good form he would put these away with closed eyes, whips it to deep backward square leg boundary
not much room outside off this time and the batsman gets an under edge to the keeper as he looks to cut

what a drop! Two fielders converge under this skier at short fine leg.. They are standing next to each other. Ashwin and Karn. Karn pulls out. Ashwin gets both hands to it but can't hold on to it. It was a slog that took the top edge. What a clanger that was!
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it down the ground to long on
bowls a slower one, but this is short enough.. the batsman gets all the time to adjust and cuts it firmly through backward point for a boundary
length delivery on the stumps and Hales launches into it, wants to send this to the University of Birmingham but doesn't get it off the middle, he manages to clear the cover area though
he bowls a good bouncer! Hales swung his bat at that but it fizzes past the batsman's shoulder
slower delivery, this one is on a fuller length, the batsman cuts it firmly but straight to the man at point
another slower delivery, the batsman pushes it to midwicket for a quick single. Ashwin fires a through but it's not accurate enough to create any worries
he dabs it with soft hands towards cover and scuttles through for a quick single
tossed up and fuller on the stumps, driven to long off for a single
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to long on
he takes a step down and dabs the flatter delivery towards midwicket for a single
much slower this time! Tossed up as well. The batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he manages to create just enough room and cuts it hard through backward point.. beats the deep point fielder easily
still a bit short from the leggie, Hales punches it straight to cover
some turn outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and cuts it through backward point for a couple
comes down the pitch and the bowler shortens his length, the batsman cuts it but can't beat Raina at point
he swings across the line and flat-bats it to deep midwicket
he chops it firmly off the back foot in front of point and calls for a quick single
quicker and outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to point
fires in a yorker, but Jadeja has ovestepped! .. Tight call, but a fair one..
fires it full outside off and all the batsman could do is to drive it along the ground to deep extra cover
pushed through on the stumps, Root goes back and whips it to deep midwicket
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman punches it to mid-on but Ashwin cuts it off
he comes down the pitch and slogs it across the line, without much timing, to deep midwicket
bowls the carrom-ball, but this is short enough for the batsman to go down on his knee and pulls it to deep square leg
flatter and quicker on the stumps, Hales takes off for a quick single with a push to midwicket
he comes down the pitch and works the quicker delivery to deep midwicket..
he comes down the pitch and slaps this widish delivery through extra cover for a couple
a lot of width again, the batsman punches it firmly to deep extra cover for yet another couple
drags it from wide outside off to deep midwicket, just a single this time
this one is in the arc! Hales has smashed this high and deep into the stands at cow corner! Massive hit

Awesome catch by Rahane! He was at long-on and this skier was dropping towards the edge of the circle - where the advertising is placed on the outfield - and for a moment it looked like it was going to drop safely, but Rahane covers a lot of ground and dives forward to pick up a stunner. Hales was looking for his second six of the over
he waits on the back foot and cuts it through backward point for a single
quicker delivery on off, the batsman punches it down the pitch, Ashwin dives to his left and makes the stop
he goes deep in the crease and whips this quicker delivery to the leg side for a single
much slower this time from Ashwin, the batsman defends it to the off side
he comes down the pitch but can only punch it back to the bowler
he has middled it! A dangerous shot to play but Morgan has slogged this over deep midwicket. Flighted and Morgan takes the toll
shorter outside off but Morgan murders it to the leg side with a powerful pull, but there is protection at deep midwicket
he comes out of the pitch too early, Karn shortens his length and the batsman is hit on the pads.. it rolls fine on the off side for a leg bye
tossed up outside off, Root drives it firmly but straight to extra cover
flatter and on the stumps, some away turn on this too, Root punches it back to the bowler
slogged! But this is a top-edge.. It's Raaaayudu this time. The fielder runs in from deep midwicket and slides under it. Karn gets his first wicket.
tossed up on off, smartly driven down the ground, past the stumps for a single
slower this time from Karn, the batsman is beaten in the flight as he lunges forward, and this one spins past the outside edge
he loves to play the reverse sweep, picks it from leg stump and slaps it to deep cover
slower on the pads, the batsman nudges it through square leg for a single
fired on the pads, the batsman flicks it to backward square leg for a single
much slower from the bowler, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
he gets a big top edge on this reverse sweep, over the short third-man fielder.. Rayudu runs around from deep point and keeps it in
flatter on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to backward square leg and calls for a single. Buttler has to stretch to get in after calling for a couple, but he makes it back in time
fired full on the pads, the batsman charges and flicks it to deep square leg
some turn for Jadeja, the batsman misses the flick to leg side and gets hit on top of the pads.. but that was heading down
that's a quick 100 kph yorker, Morgan gets his bat down in time to block it
plays it to deep midwicket with the turn for a single
punched to extra cover but Mohit dives and cuts it off, prevents the single
fuller delivery on off, still no single as the batsman squeezes it out to point
flatter outside off, Morgan uses the depth of the crease and punches it to deep extra cover
he shortens the length as he sees the batsman charge, Buttler can only defend it in the end
still no runs as the batsman finds the cover fielder with this powerful drive
he comes down the pitch, but this is shorter and slower, the batsman can only defend it to cover and he takes off for a single
the low bounce foxes the batsman! It was short and asking to be pulled, but it slips under the bat
he chips it over midwicket but only a single this time
he fires this one on the blockhole and Morgan manages to punch it down the ground, right in the gap between the two fielders
short delivery, Morgan knew it was coming and he smashes it down the ground, over long on for a huge six
allows this to spin in, then punches it to long on firmly
fired in the blockhole, Morgan drives it to long on
shorter and flatter outside off, Buttler whacks it down the ground to long off for a single
he comes down the pitch and slaps this flatter delivery down to wide long on for a ingle
long hop! "Nahin, chhota nahin," says Dhoni, admonishing his bowler for pitching short.. that has been hammered over the cow corner
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman punches it through the off side for a single to deep extra cover
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman pushes it with soft hands towards point for a single
another short one, Morgan pulls it along the ground and picks up a couple to wide long on
short again! Morgan is killing these ones.. He has to swing with the turn and he sends this soaring over deep midwicket, into the stands..

oh he gets a wicket off a poor ball! This is a low full toss and Buttler doesn't get the timing he would have wanted as he clobbers it to the leg side, it settles in the hands of deep midwicket fielder
bowls another full toss, Morgan is not able to take advantage, punches it down to long on
fuller delivery on the stumps, Bops calmly punches it down the ground to long off
straight as an arrow! This is a half-volley that has been drilled over the bowler's head! It's flat and it's over the ropes
shorter delivery, now he pulls it across the line to wide long-on for a couple. Morgan gets to his fifty. Superb innings.
this is an amazing shot! He was making room but Shami fired it full outside off.. Morgan leans forward and punches it over cover with amazing timing.. just lands short of the boundary
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman can only push it back to the bowler
he walks across the stumps and whacks the slower delivery over backward square leg! This is smart cricket. He knew it was going to be the slower ball and wrists it over the fielder
full and on the stumps, bowled at normal pace, the batsman punches it down the ground to long on
that's a poor delivery! A low full toss wide outside off, again, Morgan leans on it and whacks it over cover for another boundary
massive massive! This touches the moon and lands just over the ropes behind the bowler! This was a low full toss and Morgan was ready for that
another full toss! Morgan is playing a blinder.. this is a baseball home run.. over long-on, deep into the stands.. poor delivery from Mohit and he has been made to pay heavily. Superb from Morgan
superb yorker! Not much that can be done. Bops does the best thing though, gives strike to Morganster..
he is not able to get under this low full toss this time! Still, he times it so well that it travels quickly to long off. Another catch for Rahane, who makes it look simple
now Bops takes over! That is flicked to the cow corner boundary.. It was a quick and low full toss that is whipped with a lot of bottom hand.. It lands on the skirting..
another full toss, Bops hammers it through extra cover! The yorker gone wrong.. it's hurting India. England are feasting
whoaaa!! Bopsta!!! He gets a low full toss on the pads, this is easily flicked over deep square leg.. this has been timed so well it lands in the crowd
slower delivery finally! The batsman misses the pull and Dhoni strikes the stumps
